## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy)
Neon rain outside. Quiet code inside. Perfect focus.
A rainy night hums softly beyond the window as neon reflections ripple across the glass. The CRT glows teal in a dim, purple-lit room. This 3-hour Lo-Fi + Vaporwave mix is built for deep focus, designed to support coding, studying, writing, and long late-night creative sessions.
Royalty-free and safe for content creators.
Best For
- Coding and software development
- Late-night study sessions
- Creative writing and deep work
- Calm ambient background focus
Aesthetic
Rain streaks • CRT teal glow • magenta city lights • analog audio gear • vaporwave fog • quiet neon atmosphere
## 4. VISUAL DESIGN (Image + Animation Notes)
### Image Prompt — Neon Rain Coding Desk
Cozy neon-lit corner desk setup on a rainy night, teal CRT monitor glowing with terminal-style text, magenta city lights outside a single rain-soaked window, stacked analog audio equipment with subtle LEDs, indoor plants framing the scene, vaporwave color palette, glass desk reflections, large framed wall art, no mirrors, no duplicate reflections.
### Animation Notes
- Vertical rain streaks on the window only
- Subtle city light bokeh pulses
- Light CRT flicker approximately every 20–30 seconds
- Slight plant sway
- No camera movement
- No added reflections or motion blur
